import { DividerVertical } from '@looker/components'

import { ArgsTable, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'

<Meta component={DividerVertical} title="Docs/DividerVertical" />

# DividerVertical

`<DividerVertical />` has a default height of 1rem. That can be changed by using the prop `height` or `stretch`. Do not use both props.

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

## Props

<ArgsTable of={DividerVertical} exclude={excludedProps} />
